timeline.message: Don't permit arguments to join to be null

timeline.bodyText: This dependency needs to be added to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/dataflow-pom.xml.  (Once we start using the Maven publish gradle plugin, the pom file will be automatically generated and we won't have to do this.)
timeline.author: smillst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,7 @@
 dependencies {
     implementation project(':javacutil')
     implementation project(':checker-qual')
+    implementation 'org.plumelib:plume-util:1.1.5'

timeline.bodyText: This dependency needs to be added to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/framework-test-pom.xml.
timeline.author: smillst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,8 @@ dependencies {
     implementation project(':javacutil')
     implementation project(':checker-qual')
 
+    implementation 'org.plumelib:plume-util:1.1.5'

timeline.bodyText: Just to be clear, do NOT add this to checker-framework/docs/developer/release/maven-artifacts/checker-pom.xml.  That is the pom file for the fat jar that includes all dependencies.
timeline.author: smillst
